page.title: 10Cossington Acorns
page.content: {Cossington Acorns}is our local football club.It's been running for nearly 3 years.The commitee is lead by Bob Moss.The first year in the league was'nt very successful but this season 1984/5 we did quite well.The club started in November 1982 and it was founded by John Toynton.Our worst defeat was against Barrow we lost 16-1.John Benson is the only player in the club that has scored 5 goals in one game.I have scored 3 in one game.When you go to{Stonehill}Mr Moss hopes we will play for the{Oaks}.When we leave{Stonehill}we can play for {Cossington Olympics}.I started playing in November 1982.I have been playing for 3 years.I am really interested in it. By Steven Eames (helped by Steven Reynolds) Aged 10.
